newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - November 6.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - November 6.

text.p: The following stories appeared in Wednesday's edition of Daily Variety:

HOLLYWOOD - Ron Bension, who has served at Seagram Co Ltd's MCA Recreation Services Group for the past 25 years, most recently as chairman and chief executive officer, was dismissed from his post. No replacement has been named.
HOLLYWOOD - MGM -United Artists Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Frank Mancuso is apparently considering Producer Roger Birnbaum for the job as president of United Artists.
